thread.section_title: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group | printpps.com
thread.title: FRAN
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by FRAN

author: FRAN
title: FRAN
text: Loved the personal contact this USA company gives. Everything was just as I ordered, and it arrived quickly. Their website was very easy to use, and when I called the company with a question, it was answered quickly. They offer a top quality product at a super great price!! The only thing I would change is I'd like to have the option on 3X4" sticky notes to have the sticky be on the 3" side OR on the 4" side. Currently on the 3X4" size the sticky has to go on the 4" side. On larger size sticky pads (ie: 4X5" size) the sticky can be placed on either the 4" side or the 5" side. But I was able to live with the 3X4 restriction. Overall everything was super great, and we'll definitely use Personalized Paper Mfg. Group again!
